attributes.action: Matt Hancock to apologise to Dr Rosena Allin-Khan for his derogatory response
attributes.additional_details: Mr Hancock’s remark was sexist and derogatory to a female MP and totally uncalled for given the nature of the line of questioning on testing for Covid-19.
attributes.background: The Health Secretary should publicly apologise to the member for Tooting for the disrespectful way he replied to her question in Parliament.

rejection.details: We cannot accept petitions that call for an action relating to a particular individual. Statements by individual Ministers are a matter for those Ministers, and not the Government or House of Commons.
